description: Try our easy to follow Tuna & Asparagus Pasta Mornay recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta bake,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Fish,High protein,Soy free,Asparagus,Peanut free
name: Tuna & Asparagus Pasta Mornay Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g tuna in brine, drained and flaked
2 bunch asparagus, trimmed and cut into 4 cm lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Lightly grease a 20cm-square (6 cup) baking dish.
Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water according to packet instructions. Add asparagus for the last 2 minutes of cooking time. Drain pasta and asparagus and transfer to a large bowl.
Combine cheeses in a bowl and reserve half a cup.

Melt butter in a saucepan and stir in flour until smooth. Stir over heat for 1 minute. Remove from heat and gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Return to heat and stir until sauce boils and thickens. Add cheeses and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Add tuna, lemon rind and juice and parsley to pasta and asparagus. Pour over cheese sauce and stir to combine.
Transfer to a dish and top with reserved cheese. Bake for about 30 minutes or until golden.
